name: Road Rage (itch) (Kayla Ward)
description:
Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the vehicle around the racetrack while avoiding obstacles and race against an AI driver. *If you can't move the vehicle immediately when the game starts, click on the game screen and you will be able to move the race car.

Assests:

Simple Roads (used for racetrack), link: Simple Roads | 3D Roadways | Unity Asset Store

Free Low Poly Desert Pack (used for environment), link: Free Low Poly Desert Pack | 3D Environments | Unity Asset Store

Cartoon Formula One Car (used as player model), link: Cartoon Formula One Car | 3D Land | Unity Asset Store

Disclaimer: This game has been developed for educational purposes and I do not own any rights to the song.
